properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ORDER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , O.ORDER_POPTION AS ORDER_SE_POPTION , O.ORDER_PAMOUNT AS ORDER_SE_PAMOUNT , SPMY_ORDER.PRICE , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" FROM SP_ORDERPRODUCT O JOIN SPMY_ORDER USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_UD USING(PRODUCT_NO) ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT ORDER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , O.ORDER_POPTION AS ORDER_SE_POPTION , O.ORDER_PAMOUNT AS ORDER_SE_PAMOUNT , SPMY_ORDER.PRICE , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" FROM SP_ORDERPRODUCT O JOIN SPMY_ORDER USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_UD USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
